chunks.zh: 高速上看到不少敢开 150 公里摩托车
chunks.en: Saw many motorcycles daring to go 150 km/h on the highway

chunks.zh: 今年开车去岳母家，高速上看到不少摩托车，车速估计能到 150 公里，高速上敢这么开的车手真是头一年见到，不知道该说啥，炫车技还是嫌命长？
chunks.en: This year, driving to my mother-in-law's place, I saw many motorcycles on the highway. Their speed was probably around 150 km/h. It's the first time I've seen riders daring to drive like that on the highway. I don't know what to say, are they showing off their skills or do they think their lives are too long?

chunks.zh: 看楼里的某回复就知道了，尊重祝福就行，没必要管别人的死活的
chunks.en: Reading some of the replies in this thread, you'll see that just respect and offer blessings, no need to worry about other people's lives.

chunks.zh: 要你管
chunks.en: Mind your own business

chunks.zh: 骑手危不危险我不关心，别他妈摔我车上就行
chunks.en: I don't care if the rider is in danger, just don't crash into my car.

chunks.zh: 放下助人情节，尊重他人命运
chunks.en: Drop the savior complex, respect other people's fate.

chunks.zh: 会有他们命中注定的大运的,不要管
chunks.en: They will have their destined good fortune, don't worry about it.

chunks.zh: 每次谈到高速的高速时总会有一些老司机们把违法当自己资历，不论一二三四五六七八九十轮。
chunks.en: Every time the topic of speeding on the highway comes up, some experienced drivers treat illegal behavior as their qualification, regardless of whether they have one, two, three... or ten wheels.

chunks.zh: 新年刚过，祝愿各位遵纪守法的司机们能远离这些陆基巡航导弹，也祝愿诸位导弹们能找个僻静的地方自己炸掉为我国人口减负出一分力。
chunks.en: The new year just passed, I wish all law-abiding drivers can stay away from these land-based cruise missiles, and I also wish those missiles can find a quiet place to blow themselves up and contribute to reducing the population burden in our country.

chunks.zh: 有人喝酒敢开车理解不了有人告诉跑 150 ？
chunks.en: Some people dare to drive drunk, can't understand someone saying they are going 150?

chunks.zh: @Midnight 应该说危险在于小车不会会预想到自己跑着 130 ，会有一辆摩托车 150+的速度在两个车道间超车，并且还有可能完全位于右侧盲区。
chunks.en: @Midnight The danger is that cars wouldn't expect a motorcycle speeding at 150+ km/h overtaking between lanes while they are driving at 130 km/h, and it might even be completely in the right-side blind spot.

chunks.zh: 不过庆幸的是大排量摩托引擎声够大
chunks.en: Fortunately, high displacement motorcycles have loud engine sounds.

chunks.zh: 这些个车超速违法，没的说。
chunks.en: These vehicles are speeding and breaking the law, no question about it.

chunks.zh: 然后实际情况是，尽快躲开免费时段才上高速的一年一箱油的移动路障，对这些摩托车驾驶人来说比起超速可能反而还安全一点🤨
chunks.en: The reality is that avoiding the mobile roadblocks that only fill up one tank of gas per year and only get on the highway during free toll periods might actually be safer for these motorcycle riders than speeding. 🤨

chunks.zh: 问题这些人超速是会影响别人的生命财产安全。
chunks.en: The problem is that these people's speeding will affect the life and property safety of others.

chunks.zh: @wtks1 尊重祝福？他死没死我不在乎，我在乎的是他害路上的别人
chunks.en: @wtks1 Respect and blessings? I don't care if they die, I care about them harming other people on the road.

chunks.zh: 摩托车 600 排量以上的 150 其实还好，国外我看动不动就是 200 以上那才叫疯狂
chunks.en: 150 is actually okay for motorcycles with 600cc or more. In foreign countries, I see 200+ all the time, that's crazy.

chunks.zh: 我是没太明白对摩托车群体的恶意到底哪来的，我自己又开车又骑车，你要说 sb 哪个群体没有呢。
chunks.en: I don't quite understand where the malice towards the motorcycle group comes from. I drive and ride myself. If you're talking about idiots, which group doesn't have them?

chunks.zh: 楼下炸街的也不一定是摩托车，四轮跑车一样炸。
chunks.en: It's not necessarily motorcycles causing noise on the streets, four-wheeled sports cars do the same.

chunks.zh: 至于说高速禁止摩托车上，事实上很多城市的禁限摩本身就是违法的，无规范性文件或文件已过期，或者未通过当地人大的立法审查。
chunks.en: As for highways prohibiting motorcycles, in fact, the motorcycle bans in many cities themselves are illegal, with no regulatory documents or expired documents, or have not passed the legislative review of the local people's congress.

chunks.zh: 很多城市摩托车是可以上高速的，但道交法规定高速摩托车只允许时速 80 ，所以这个 150 肯定是超速的。
chunks.en: Motorcycles are allowed on the highway in many cities, but the traffic law stipulates that motorcycles are only allowed to travel at 80 km/h on the highway, so this 150 is definitely speeding.

chunks.zh: 抛开限速不说的话，摩托车在高速骑的慢反而是更危险的，甩开车流才安全。
chunks.en: Leaving aside the speed limit, riding slowly on the highway is more dangerous for motorcycles; it's safer to stay ahead of the traffic flow.

chunks.zh: 最后声明下虽然摩托车禁止上高速这个规定本身违法，但合法限制的 80 时速与我对摩托车在高速行驶的安全理解互斥，所以我不骑车上高速。
chunks.en: Finally, let me state that although the regulation prohibiting motorcycles from entering the highway is itself illegal, the legally limited speed of 80 km/h and my understanding of the safety of motorcycles on the highway are mutually exclusive, so I don't ride a motorcycle on the highway.

chunks.zh: @Eddiegaao 我确实是一个迟到比较离谱的人，但是起码我是知道这是错的，而且还是知错不改那类型。
chunks.en: @Eddiegaao I am indeed a person who is often ridiculously late, but at least I know it's wrong, and I'm the type who knows it's wrong but doesn't change.

chunks.zh: 但是起码我不会说我迟到不超过“20%”来自诩我时间掌控精准。
chunks.en: But at least I wouldn't say that I'm never more than '20%' late to praise my precise time management.

chunks.zh: 我认为我并不双标的依据是我认为迟到 1 分钟也是迟到，超速 1km/h 也是超速，而且并不会以此为荣。
chunks.en: The reason I don't think I'm being hypocritical is that I think being 1 minute late is still being late, and speeding 1 km/h is still speeding, and I wouldn't be proud of it.

chunks.zh: 小车大车摩托车都有超速的,自己别超速就好
chunks.en: Cars, trucks, and motorcycles all speed, just don't speed yourself.

chunks.zh: 什么车型。150 可不慢啊，怎么估计的。
chunks.en: What kind of vehicle? 150 is not slow, how did you estimate it?

chunks.zh: 对有些摩托车来说，150km 是极速了一档的极速
chunks.en: For some motorcycles, 150km/h is the maximum speed in first gear.

chunks.zh: 尊重祝福
chunks.en: Respect and blessings
Drop... respect...

chunks.zh: 真的有摩托上高速的吗
chunks.en: Are there really motorcycles on the highway?
